gflsegpy.tests package¶

Submodules¶

gflsegpy.tests.test_coord module¶

gflsegpy.tests.test_coord.Y()[source]¶

Returns a centered simulated signal of shape (60, 3) with 3 breakpoints.

gflsegpy.tests.test_coord.test_block_coordinate_descent()[source]¶

Tests the shape of the beta returned by _block_coordinate_descent().

gflsegpy.tests.test_coord.test_find_breakpoints()[source]¶

Tests the well-functionning of _find_breakpoints().

gflsegpy.tests.test_coord.test_gfl_coord()[source]¶

Tests the outputs formats of _gfl_coord().

gflsegpy.tests.test_lars module¶

gflsegpy.tests.test_lars.Y()[source]¶

Returns a centered simulated signal of shape (60, 3) with 3 breakpoints.

gflsegpy.tests.test_lars.test_gfl_lars()[source]¶

Test the shape of the breakpoints returned by gfl_lars().
